summary: An imaginative woman copes with a debilitating form of cancer by remaining optimistic and spending time with her friends.
cast: Baihe Bai|Daniel Wu|Zi-Xuan Zhang|Yuan Li|Ruilin Liu|Yi Cheng|Jianyi Li|Lili Liu|Teng Shen|Li Qin|Xiaochuan Li|Xinyu Li|Keiichi Yamasaki|Jinchen Li|Fan Yang|Zi Xing|Guoliang Xu|Guo Wei|Fang Liu|Le Tian|Jie Lian|Shiliu Liu|Temur Mamisashvili
title: Gun dan ba! Zhong liu jun
